[00:00.00]Otherside (Explicit) - Post Malone
[00:06.36]Written by：Louis Bell/Post Malone
[00:12.73]Producer：Louis Bell/Post Malone
[00:19.09]I been waiting wide awake for the waves to come and take
[00:23.60]Take me right to you
[00:25.59]
[00:28.11]One hundred bottles of the good sh*t couldn't even bring you back
[00:32.90]What am I to do
[00:34.62]
[00:37.10]Feel like I'm circling a giant all
[00:40.10]I see is the remains of an ugly truth
[00:43.77]
[00:46.33]One hundred models I could follow all the way to hell
[00:50.17]And back but they can't replace you
[00:52.90]
[00:55.70]Oh oh oh ohh
[00:57.94]Oh oh oh ohh
[01:00.19]Oh oh oh ohh ohh
[01:02.64]
[01:04.78]Oh oh oh ohh
[01:06.99]Oh oh oh ohh
[01:08.79]
[01:09.31]Oh oh oh ohh
[01:11.08]
[01:13.70]I was putting on for you like a Jersey
[01:15.95]What I didn't know then couldn't hurt me
[01:18.12]Never thought you were gonna do me dirty
[01:20.27]Let me into cover on the east side I was burning
[01:22.34]
[01:23.27]But that's just the way it goes
[01:25.37]Wish that I could have control
[01:27.68]Everybody dies alone
[01:29.68]
[01:31.57]Save my breath but I lost faith a long time ago
[01:38.82]
[01:40.81]Dream nightmares
[01:44.09]I guess we're getting used to losing hope
[01:47.96]
[01:50.72]I don't even wanna know why you don't answer when I call your name
[01:57.26]
[01:59.73]Are you on the other side will you save us
[02:03.89]Or will you run away
[02:06.34]
[02:08.89]I'm still waiting wide awake for the waves to come and take
[02:13.39]Take me right to you
[02:15.18]
[02:17.76]One hundred vials of denial I know they won't bring you back
[02:22.42]What am I to do
[02:24.47]
[02:27.04]Cover alibi motive when I'm lying to myself of the ugly truth
[02:33.57]
[02:36.19]Quitters strangers to the flame
[02:38.39]We will never be the same if we make it through
[02:42.86]And we can make it through
[02:44.62]
[02:45.35]My back is up against the wall
[02:46.92]
[02:47.63]But I used to feel invincible
[02:49.22]
[02:49.91]Yeah it was us against the world
[02:51.59]
[02:52.13]But somehow someway the take is coming
[02:53.95]
[02:54.52]I remember back then
[02:55.60]
[02:56.22]Played my cards right you were my best hand
[02:57.91]
[02:58.97]Still you keep me guessing
[03:00.29]
[03:00.90]Wonder will I ever get the message
[03:03.12]Save my breath but I lost faith a long time ago
[03:10.26]
[03:12.24]Dream nightmares
[03:15.46]I guess we're getting used to losing hope
[03:19.44]
[03:22.00]I don't even wanna know why you don't answer when I call your name
[03:28.71]
[03:31.14]Are you on the other side will you save us
[03:35.37]Or will you run away
[03:37.74]
[03:40.26]Are you on the other side will you save us
[03:44.53]Or will you run away
data.trans:
[ti:Otherside (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:beerbongs & bentleys (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.36]//
[00:12.72]//
[00:19.09]我一直保持清醒 等待着潮汐
[00:23.60]将我带到你身边
[00:25.59]
[00:28.11]喝了上百瓶好酒 但你依然没有回到我身边
[00:32.90]我该如何是好
[00:34.62]
[00:37.10]感觉我像是在原地转圈
[00:40.10]我明白这是个残忍的真相
[00:43.77]
[00:46.33]无数个名模 我可以与她们逢场作戏
[00:50.17]但她们永远无法取代你
[00:52.90]
[00:55.70]//
[00:57.94]//
[01:00.19]//
[01:02.64]
[01:04.78]//
[01:06.99]//
[01:08.79]
[01:09.31]//
[01:11.08]
[01:13.70]我追逐着你 我像Jersey那样
[01:15.95]我曾一无所知 所以那时我并未受伤
[01:18.12]我从未想过你会让我陷入如此狼狈的困境
[01:20.27]你使我激情澎湃
[01:22.34]
[01:23.27]这就是事情发展的方向
[01:25.37]我多希望我能掌控一切
[01:27.68]每个人都会孤独地死去
[01:29.68]
[01:31.57]省省力气吧 我很早之前就已丧失信心
[01:38.82]
[01:40.81]梦魇纠缠着我们
[01:44.09]我想我们正渐渐习惯这绝望的生活
[01:47.96]
[01:50.72]我甚至不想知道当我呼喊你的名字时 你为何不给我回应
[01:57.26]
[01:59.73]你在彼岸吗 你会拯救我们
[02:03.89]还是会逃离
[02:06.34]
[02:08.89]我一直保持清醒 等待着潮汐
[02:13.39]把我带到你身边
[02:15.18]
[02:17.76]喝了上百瓶好酒 但你依然没有回到我身边
[02:22.42]我该如何是好
[02:24.47]
[02:27.04]当我自欺欺人时 我试图掩盖这残忍的事实
[02:33.57]
[02:36.19]对你而言 我只是个半途而废的陌生人
[02:38.39]如果我们能修成正果 那么我们一定会与众不同
[02:42.86]我们一定能达成所愿 
[02:44.62]
[02:45.35]我背靠着墙
[02:46.92]
[02:47.63]但我曾战无不胜
[02:49.22]
[02:49.91]是的 我们曾与全世界对抗
[02:51.59]
[02:52.13]但我们就要自食恶果
[02:53.95]
[02:54.52]还记得那时候
[02:55.60]
[02:56.22]命运之牌掌握在你我手中
[02:57.91]
[02:58.97]但你却总让我猜想你的心思
[03:00.29]
[03:00.90]我怀疑我是否能得到正确的信息
[03:03.12]省省力气吧 我很早之前就已丧失信心
[03:10.26]
[03:12.24]梦魇纠缠着我们
[03:15.46]我想我们正渐渐习惯这绝望的生活
[03:19.44]
[03:22.00]我甚至不想知道当我呼喊你的名字时 你为何不给我回应
[03:28.71]
[03:31.14]你在彼岸吗 你会拯救我们
[03:35.37]还是会逃离
[03:37.74]
[03:40.26]你在彼岸吗 你会拯救我们
[03:44.53]还是会逃离
